chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 13 product has the above problem: 
The camera cannot be covered with a camera lens cover. This means it's not an original part but a replica. That's not agreed upon. Additionally, the attempt has now destroyed three protective covers (each €5).

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We hope you are well.

You have received the product for repair, the 10/06/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without an answer with a valid tracking link before the 14/06/2024 we will refund the customer.

Nest regards,
Esra-Nur from Back Market

Hello ecomobile

Before you send the device, please confirm if customer can use a protective glass on the camera.

If not, customer wishes a refund. 

We're looking forward to your reply and wish you a great weekend.

Regards,
Esra-Nur from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
YL
